Module jGame
Package jGame.core.ui.hud

Class UIHudElementGroup

java.lang.Object
jGame.core.ui.hud.UIHudElement
jGame.core.ui.hud.UIHudElementGroup
public class UIHudElementGroup
extends UIHudElement
Represents a group of UIHudElements to be grouped in a certain area. This makes it so that any elements inside this are constrained relative to this element, while this is constrained relative to it's parent element (or the window if there is no parent element).
Since:
2.0.0
Author:
Nuno Pereira

    static int SIZE_THRESHOLD
    The slack, in pixels, to give when sizing this element: if we can fit another element within the group's width plus this threshold, increase the width.

  • Constructor Details

    • UIHudElementGroup

      public UIHudElementGroup​(int x, int y, int width, int height, int constraintType, int[] constraintValues)
      Creates an element group in the given position, with the given dimensions and using the given constraints. The group stars with no elements.
      Parameters:
      x - the horizontal position of the element group
      y - the vertical position of the element group
      width - the width of the element group
      height - the height of the element group
      constraintType - the type of constraint to apply
      constraintValues - the values to apply when constraining this element
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • UIHudElementGroup

      public UIHudElementGroup​(int x, int y, int width, int height, java.util.List<UIHudElement> itemsToAdd)
      Creates an element group in the given position, with the given dimensions, out of the given list of UIHudElements.
      Parameters:
      x - the horizontal position of the element group
      y - the vertical position of the element group
      width - the width of the element group
      height - the height of the element group
      itemsToAdd - the initial elements to add to the group
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • UIHudElementGroup

      public UIHudElementGroup​(int x, int y, int width, int height, int constraintType, int[] constraintValues, java.util.List<UIHudElement> itemsToAdd)
      Creates an element group in the given position, with the given dimensions and using the given constraints, out of the given list of UIHudElements.
      Parameters:
      x - the horizontal position of the element group
      y - the vertical position of the element group
      width - the width of the element group
      height - the height of the element group
      constraintType - the type of constraint to apply
      constraintValues - the values to apply when constraining this element
      itemsToAdd - the initial elements to add to the group

      2.0.0
